turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good morning, to start the day I would like you to go to the Starbucks that is close to our company, at 237 Pennsylvania Ave SE.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good morning, I will go straight from here to there

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's near here, it should be fast

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it's okay, tell me the information about the drink you want from there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well I would like an espresso with freshly steamed milk with syrup, with a vanilla flavor, covered with a drizzle of caramel.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well, I'm reviewing the menu and I'm asking for a Caramel Macchiato

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That same is, and ask to be charged to my account, you can request one for you if you want.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, thank you very much, and the order is done, I will pick it up shortly and I will take it to the office, the charge will be referred to your mobile phone

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, thanks, I hope so.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be as fast as possible, the order is already done, I just have to go through the

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, Tell me, today how has the family been? Did you remember asking for a drink for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My family well, and yours? and yes, thank you very much, it's the best way to start the day

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well I'm very happy and yes, nothing better than to start the day with what you like

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well yes, that's right, for espresso, I ask you to give it a lot of foam?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, with extra foam, tell me, what drink did you order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I ordered an espresso with fresh steamed milk and cinnamon-flavored syrup Dolce with sweetened whipped cream and cinnamon Dolce dressing.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ahh! the famous "Cinnamon Dolce Latte" from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, in the online menu it says that a surprise awaits me and I really want to know what it is.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, see what it is, remember to arrive on time

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm already here, I'm on my way to the office

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok.
